title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water. Meanwhile, fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy. Beat the eggs in a bowl and mix with grated parmesan. Drain the spaghetti, combine it with the pancetta, and remove from heat. Quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture to create a creamy sauce. Season with freshly ground black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in tikka masala paste for 1 hour. Grill the chicken until cooked through. In a pan, melt butter and add the tomato sauce. Stir in the grilled chicken and simmer for 10 minutes. Pour in the cream and cook for another 5 minutes. Serve with rice or naan bread.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of sautéed vegetables in a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a large pan. Add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds. Toss in the broccoli, bell pepper, and snap peas. Stir fry for 5-7 minutes until crisp-tender. Add soy sauce and stir well. Serve immediately over steamed rice or noodles.
